mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chi_tiet_don_hang(sys_id_inbound, ma_pr, ma_po, sys_id_khang_hang, sys_id_san_pham, so_luong, gia, tong_chi_phi, ngay_nhap) VALUES (#{maInBound}, #{maPR}, #{maPO}, #{maKhachHang}, #{maSanPham}, #{soLuong}, #{gia}, #{tongChiPhi}, #{ngayNhap});
mapper.update: UPDATE chi_tiet_don_hang SET -- sys_id_inbound = #{maInBound}, -- ma_pr = #{maPR}, -- ma_po = #{maPO}, sys_id_khang_hang = #{maKhachHang}, sys_id_san_pham = #{maSanPham}, so_luong = #{soLuong}, gia = #{gia}, tong_chi_phi = #{tongChiPhi}, ngay_nhap = #{ngayNhap} WHERE sys_id_chi_tiet_don_hang = #{sysIdChiTietDonHang};
mapper.select: SELECT sys_id_chi_tiet_don_hang, sys_id_inbound, ma_pr, ma_po, sys_id_khang_hang, sys_id_san_pham, so_luong, gia, tong_chi_phi, ngay_nhap FROM chi_tiet_don_hang;

SELECT ct.sys_id_chi_tiet_don_hang, ct.sys_id_inbound, ct.ma_pr, ct.ma_po, ct.sys_id_khang_hang, ct.sys_id_san_pham, sp.ten_san_pham, ct.so_luong, ct.gia, ct.tong_chi_phi, ct.ngay_nhap FROM chi_tiet_don_hang ct JOIN san_pham sp ON ct.sys_id_san_pham = sp.sys_id_san_pham WHERE ct.ma_pr = #{maPR};
